title: Lovely handwritten script
author: dead.sound

comments.content:
Most probably a calligraphic hand-lettering for letterpress as all repeating letters look different.  
Some alternatives from previous discussions: [http://typophile.com/node/93681](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415121954/http:/typophile.com/node/93681 "http://typophile.com/node/93681"), [http://typophile.com/node/97524](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415121954/http:/typophile.com/node/97524 "http://typophile.com/node/97524"), [http://typophile.com/node/91757](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415121954/http:/typophile.com/node/91757 "http://typophile.com/node/91757"), [http://typophile.com/node/97535](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415121954/http:/typophile.com/node/97535 "http://typophile.com/node/97535"), [http://typophile.com/node/94437](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415121954/http:/typophile.com/node/94437 "http://typophile.com/node/94437")
